channel.title: 317 - Enable Trading
channel.description:
Hey,
Nooby question here, on my source (Cammy-PVP) whenever I try to trade it says that's it's temporarily disabled. What do I have to change to enable it again?
--
Leo.

item.title: 317 - Enable Trading
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vinci Da Vinci
item.description:
@Da_Vinci wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:2, topic:350541”]search “trading has been temporarily disabled”(or whatever message you get) in client.java, and delete the whole code.[/quote]’

Okay, so I deleted the

public void tradeReq(int id) { if (!server.trading) { sM("Trading has been temporarily disabled."); return; }

Now part of the code looks like

} deleteItem(itemID, fromSlot, amount); resetItems(3322); resetTItems(3415); other.resetOTItems(3416); sendFrame126("", 3431); other.sendFrame126("", 3431); return true; } } client other = (client) handler.players[id]; if(!playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Alex") && !other.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Alex")){ sM("Trading has been temporarily disabled."); return; }

I get 100 errors though, where is the missing/wrong bracket?

EDIT: Still not solved.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 - Enable Trading
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

search “trading has been temporarily disabled”(or whatever message you get) in client.java, and delete the whole code.
